name: Changed: Clean Up Crew (Demo)
description:
You play as Troy, a janitor working at Thunder Science facility. sadly, you job has been quite shit but at least you have your friend Frinky. well, until the riot started and everything got out of hand. now you must go through the riot and the aftermath. and find Frinky. hopefully you can make it out while your still man.

-Find secret collectibles

-See the lab through the eyes of someone more familiar with it

-Find out a bit more about Troy and the lab

-And make it out while your still human
